DOC.brief_summary: Skill pulmonary artery catheter ( PAC ) waveform interpretation inadequate among physicians nurse . We , investigator Massachusetts General Hospital , develop web-based computer program assist physician nurse PAC waveform interpretation . We study effectiveness program improve interpretation waveform computer-based test .
DOC.brief_title: Effectiveness Computer Application Improving Pulmonary Artery Catheter Waveform Interpretation
DOC.detailed_description: The pulmonary artery catheter ( PAC ) guide diagnosis treatment intensive care unit ( ICU ) , study show physician nurse collectively inadequate skill interpret PAC waveform . We develop Web-based application provide physician nurse rapid access relevant PAC-related content use patient care situation . The application begin visual index assist clinicians recognition normal abnormal waveform provide waveform-specific link concise advice make accurate pressure measurement , troubleshoot system problem , avoid complication catheter use . Initial evaluation consist before-and-after trial determine whether application improve test performance area waveform recognition , accuracy measurement , appropriateness action . Once resource production , electronically log usage survey user evaluate extent effect actual utilization .
DOC.criteria: Critical care nurse House officer rotate medical Intensive Care Unit Fellows rotate medical Intensive Care Unit
